actions.text: Mr. Gilman raised a point of order against the Gejdenson amendment (A001). Mr. Gilman stated the amendment offered by Mr. Gejdenson is not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.

description: Amendment sought to insert a section concerning the deployment of U.S. Armed Forces to Kosovo including a declaration of policy relating to an interim agreement; authorization for deployment of Armed Forces; declaration of policy relating to support for the Armed Forces; and a limitation of Armed Forces participation to not more than 15 percent.
purpose: An amendment no.7 in the Congressional Record to insert a section concerning the deployment of U.S. Armed Forces to Kosovo including a declaration of policy relating to an interim agreement; authorization for deployment of Armed Forces; declaration of policy relating to support for the Armed Forces; and a limitation of Armed Forces participation to not more than 15 percent.
